com.ssdd.cs.service

Class CriticalSectionService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ssdd.cs.service.CriticalSectionService
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CriticalSectionServiceProxy

    @Singleton
 @Path(value="/cs")
public class CriticalSectionService
extends java.lang.Object

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static java.util.logging.Logger LOGGER 
      private java.util.Map<java.lang.String,CritialSectionServiceNode> nodes
      associates the state of a subscribed node to it's id, and stores the state relative to the node's critical section state

      • buildProxy

        public static CriticalSectionService buildProxy(java.lang.String host)
        factory method, to build a proxy to access an instance of this service in remote.
        Parameters:
        host - the IP adress and PORT of server in which the service is allocated.
        Returns:
        CriticalSectionService to serve as proxy for the /cs service, served in the given host

      • buildServiceUri

        public static java.lang.String buildServiceUri(java.lang.String host)
        factory method, to build a URI for a CriticalSectionService from the host IP and port.
        Parameters:
        host - the IP adress and PORT of server in which the service is allocated.
        Returns:
        String containing the URI to the service, served in the given host

      • status

        @GET
 @Path(value="/status")
 @Produces(value="text/plain")
public java.lang.String status()
        shows service status.
        Returns:
        string indicating the status of the service is up.

      • restart

        @POST
 @Path(value="/restart")
public void restart()
        restarts the service cleaning all node's state structures

      • suscribe

        @POST
 @Path(value="/suscribe")
public void suscribe(@QueryParam(value="node")
                                                       java.lang.String nodeId)
        registers a node, and create the neccesary structures to work with it.
        Parameters:
        nodeId - the id of the node who wants to suscribe to current service.

      • suscribed

        @GET
 @Path(value="/suscribed")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public java.lang.String suscribed()
        return a JSON serialized list of suscribed nodes.
        Returns:
        String containing the list of suscribed nodes separated with the '_character'.

      • setCsState

        @POST
 @Path(value="/set/state")
public void setCsState(@QueryParam(value="node")
                                                          java.lang.String nodeId,
                                                          @QueryParam(value="state")
                                                          java.lang.String newState)
                                                   throws NodeNotFoundException
        set new state for the critical section on a concrete node.
        Parameters:
        nodeId - the id of the node trying to accces the critical section. Must be a suscribed node.
        newState - the new state given to the critical section by the node. Must be a String serialized CriticalSectionState
        Throws:
        NodeNotFoundException - when then nodeId doesn't corresponds to any node suscribed to current service.

      • getMessageTimeStamp

        @GET
 @Path(value="/get/messagetimestamp")
 @Produces(value="text/plain")
public long getMessageTimeStamp(@QueryParam(value="node")
                                                                                                             java.lang.String nodeId)
                                                                                                      throws NodeNotFoundException
        get a node's current lamport counter value, to use it as a timestamp on a message
        Parameters:
        nodeId - the id of the node trying to accces the critical section. Must be a suscribed node
        Returns:
        requested node's current lamport counter value
        Throws:
        NodeNotFoundException - when then nodeId doesn't corresponds to any node suscribed to current service

      • updateCounter

        @GET
 @Path(value="/update/counter")
public void updateCounter(@QueryParam(value="node")
                                                                 java.lang.String nodeId)
                                                          throws NodeNotFoundException
        updates a node's lamport counter value in one unit with the LC1 formule
        Parameters:
        nodeId - the id of the node trying to accces the critical section. Must be a suscribed node
        Throws:
        NodeNotFoundException - when then nodeId doesn't corresponds to any node suscribed to current service

      • request

        @POST
 @Path(value="/request")
public void request(@QueryParam(value="node")
                                                     java.lang.String nodeId,
                                                     @QueryParam(value="sender")
                                                     java.lang.String sender,
                                                     @QueryParam(value="messageTimeStamp")
                                                     long messageTimeStamp)
                                              throws NodeNotFoundException
        processes the requests to the critical section access, send by other nodes
        Parameters:
        nodeId - the id of the node that will be asked to access the critical section. Must be suscribed to requested service.
        sender - the id of the node trying to accces the critical section.
        messageTimeStamp - the message's timestamp (node's lamport time counter value)
        Throws:
        NodeNotFoundException - when then nodeId doesn't corresponds to any node suscribed to current service

 @Path(value="/release")
public void release(@QueryParam(value="node")

                                              throws NodeNotFoundException
        used by suscribed nodes to to release the critical section
        Parameters:
        nodeId - the id of the node trying to accces the critical section. Must be suscribed to requested service
        Throws:
        NodeNotFoundException - when then nodeId doesn't corresponds to any node suscribed to current service

 @Path(value="/lock")
public void lock(@QueryParam(value="node")

                                        throws NodeNotFoundException

        Parameters:
        nodeId - the id of the node trying to lock. Must be suscribed to requested service

      • isSuscribed

        private boolean isSuscribed(java.lang.String nodeId)
        given a nodeId checks if is suscribed to current service instance.
        Parameters:
        nodeId - id of the node we want to check if you have subscribed to this service.
        Returns:
        boolean indicating if node is suscribed to this broker
